<h3 id="X10198">X(10198)&nbsp;=&nbsp;PERSPECTOR OF THESE TRIANGLES: ABC AND 2ND-CENTROIDAL TRIANGLE OF THE INNER-YFF TRIANGLE</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a^4-2*(b+c)^2*a^2-2*b*c*(b+c)*a+(b^2-c^2)^2  :  :  <p><b>
X(10198) = R*X(1)+3*(R+r)*X(2)
</b></p>
